articles.author: Brandon Widder
articles.title: You can get a $100 gift card when you preorder Google's Pixel 8A - The Verge
articles.description: Amazon and other retailers are already offering Google’s next midrange phone with a $100 gift card. You can also save on the Beats Studio Buds and Lego’s Tiny Plants set.

articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: Helldivers 2's Community Major Order Has Flipped Over 200,000 Reviews Positive - Forbes
articles.description: Helldivers 2 players have rallied together to give the game positive reviews again now that the PSN linking saga has ended.
